name: When the Vow Breaks Online Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: It was "Open Season" for these two people when they first met even though she didn't believe she had a "Ghost" of a chance. For years the lady had been looking for "A Few Good Men" and finally found one that had a few "Jobs". Which couple was married and divorced within a span of seven years?
questions.explanation:
Demi Moore and Ashton Kutcher.

	Demi and Ashton met and dated in 2003. They were officially married on September 24, 2005. Ashton Kutcher legally filed for divorce on December 21, 2012, citing irreconcilable differences

questions.text: He was the "Hamlet" of movie trilogies and she was a dental nurse. They met in the house they shared in Australia and soon the "Braveheart" married the nurse in 1980. What couple had a twenty-year marriage before divorcing?
questions.explanation:
Mel Gibson and Robyn Gibson.

	Mel was making the "Mad Max" movies when he met Robyn. They were renting rooms in the same house in Adelaide.  Robyn and Mel had eight children. They finalized their divorce on December 23, 2011.

questions.text: He became a "Die Hard" fan of her while she was at the "Stakeout" premiere. They married in 1987 and everyone thought their marriage was "Unbreakable" until their divorce thirteen years later. Which couple fits the description?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Willis and Demi Moore.

	Bruce and Demi met at the premiere of her movie "Stakeout" (1987). They married in 1987 and had three daughters together. Their divorce was finalized in 2000.

questions.text: Evidently the fireworks started going out of this couple's marriage after he stopped reading her "Bedtime Stories". They were only married a year when one of them made a "Hop" to the divorce lawyer. Which couple divorced after fourteen months of marriage?
questions.explanation:
Katy Perry and Russell Brand.

	Katy Perry and Russell Brand met on the set of his movie "Get Me To The Greek" in 2009. They married in a Hindu ceremony performed on October 23, 2010. Russell filed for divorce in December 2011, and it was finalized in July 2012.

questions.text: They were "Far and Away" one of the best movie couples. Alas, their "Days of Thunder" ended in 2001 with divorce. What couple am I describing?
questions.explanation:
Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman.

	Tom and Nicole met on the set of "Days of Thunder". They were married on December 25, 1990 in Colorado, USA. Together they adopted two children, Isabella and Connor. The couple filed for divorce in 2001.

questions.text: This Material Girl's first marriage took place in 1985 to a fast-timing actor. Which couple gave their marriage four years before they divorced?
questions.explanation:
Madonna and Sean Penn.

	Madonna and Sean Penn married on her birthday, August 16, 1985. They had a tumultuous four year marriage before they divorced in 1989.

questions.text: She was from the block and he was a Puerto Rican bombshell. They married in 2004 and divorced eight years later. Which musical couple am I describing?
questions.explanation:
Marc Anthony and Jennifer Lopez.

	Jennifer and Marc began dating after he divorced his first wife. They married on June 5, 2004 and filed for divorce on April 9, 2012. During their marriage, they had twins Max and Emme.

questions.text: The smile made her "Miss Congeniality" to whomever she met. Her "Monster Garage" husband married her in 2005. Which former couple is being described?
questions.explanation:
Sandra Bullock and Jesse James.

	Sandra met Jesse when she took her godson to meet him at Christmas in 2004. Sandra Bullock and Jesse James married on July 16, 2005. After learning of his many marital affairs, Sandra divorced Jesse in 2010.

questions.text: This couple was married longer than "9 1/2 weeks". When they found out "She's Having His Baby", they named the little girl after a country. They both saw their divorce as "The Getaway" and divorced in 2001. What couple am I describing?
questions.explanation:
Alec Baldwin and Kim Basinger.

	Kim met Alec met on the set of "The Marrying Kind" in 1990. They married in 1993, and had daughter Ireland in 1995. Their divorce was finalized in 2002.

questions.text: The first time they met each other it was a "Scream", but later they became "Friend"-ly enough to marry. What screaming couple am I describing?
questions.explanation:
David Arquette and Courtney Cox.

	Courtney and David married on June 12, 1999. Their divorce became final in May of 2013.
